tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been going to Krk family dentistry for almost 2 years now for my daughter‚Äôs braces . It has been a long journey, but the result is truly unbelievable. Dr. Ramesh Kumar is an excellent dentist. He has a remarkable ability to inspire confidence in his patients because of his thorough and methodical approach. He  is very detailed and transparent in explaining the problems as also their resolution.He gives you a good overview and always puts you at ease.
Dr. Ramesh Kumar has a good team of experts and assistants. The Clinic is very well managed and is exceptionally clean and hygienic which is commendable.
Thank you so much for the orthodontic treatment over the last two years. My daughter has a beautiful smile and teeth but beyond  that I can see her confidence when she smiles ,thanks to you all !

-KRK Family Dentistry
